panels.content: Percona Monitoring and Management

**Overview**  
[Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM)](https://www.percona.com/pmm) is a free and open-source platform for managing and monitoring MySQL and MongoDB performance, and provides time-based analysis to ensure that your data works as efficiently as possible. 

**Documentation**  
Please consult the official [PMM documentation](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/index.html) to learn more about PMM. Also of interest are the [Release notes](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/release-notes/index.html) and [FAQ](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/faq.html) for common questions about PMM.

**Community and Blogs**  
On the [PMM Community Forums](https://www.percona.com/forums/questions-discussions/percona-monitoring-and-management) you will find help from Perconians and the Community at large.  Further, we publish PMM announcements and use cases regularly on the [Percona Database Performance Blog](https://www.percona.com/blog/category/percona-monitoring-and-management/)  

**Get Help from Percona**  
Are you looking for assistance that comes with a response-time guarantee? Let our [Support team](https://www.percona.com/services/support?utm_source=pmm&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=support_link)  help you!
Already a customer? Log in to your [Percona Support Portal](https://customers.percona.com)

targets.expr:
avg by () ((sum by (instance,cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$host",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or  
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$host",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ))*100 or 
sum by () (avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$host",mode!="idle", mode!="total",mode!="idle"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$host",mode!="idle",mode!="total",mode!="idle"}[5m])))

sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance=~"$host",device!="lo"}[$interval]) 
or irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance=~"$host",device!="lo"}[5m]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{instance=~"$host"}[5m]))
+
sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance=~"$host",device!="lo"}[$interval]) 
or irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance=~"$host",device!="lo"}[5m])
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) 
or max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{instance=~"$host"}[5m]))

sum by () (max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$host",state="current"}[$interval]) or
sum by (instance) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{instance=~"$host"}[$interval])))

sum by () (
(rate(mysql_global_status_queries{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mysql_global_status_queries{instance=~"$host"}[5m])) or 
(sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host",type!="command"}[$interval])) or 
sum(irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host",type!="command"}[5m]))) or
(sum(rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) + rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{instance=~"$host"}[$interval])) or
sum(irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{instance=~"$host"}[5m]) + irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{instance=~"$host"}[5m])))
)

clamp_max(avg by (instance) 
(sum by (cpu) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$host",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$host",mode!='idle',mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) )),1) *100 or
sum by () (
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$host",mode!="idle", mode!="total",job="rds-enhanced"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{instance=~"$host",mode!="idle", mode!="total",job="rds-enhanced"}[5m]))

(sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or
irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{instance=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{instance=~"$host"}[5m]))) + 
(sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{instance=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum(max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{instance=~"$host"}[5m])))

sum((max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{instance=~"$host"}[5m])) or
(max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$host", state="current"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$host", state="current"}[5m])) or
(sum by (instance) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{instance=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (instance) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{instance=~"$host"}[5m]))))

sum((rate(mysql_global_status_queries{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mysql_global_status_queries{instance=~"$host"}[5m])) or 
(sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host", type!="command"}[$interval])) or 
sum(irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$host", type!="command"}[5m]))) or
(sum(rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{instance=~"$host"}[$interval]) + rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{instance=~"$host"}[$interval])) or
sum(irate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{instance=~"$host"}[5m]) + irate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{instance=~"$host"}[5m]))))
